title: Loss forgiven?
body: Umm, why is did i just play a game (ranked) where 3 of my teams dc'd but none of them did. We were stomping before this bs. This constant instability is getting out of hand and its inexcusable. League of legends is the most played pc game in the world, and no other high profile games have these issues. With the immense income you guys gain you should be easily able to support more stable and reliable servers. I am now at the point of leaving and not playing and putting my time into a game that is more reliable. Think about this, because i know a load of people who are of the same p.o.v as me, and this need to addressed asap

replies.body: besides with recent posts on technical difficulty you should know better than to play ranked when they are having issues. perhaps you should play normals or a separate game while they sort it out

they have loss prevented enabled to be fair on the large if not colossal amount of disconnections caused by these technical difficulties i'm pretty sure, something like that. on the bright side I don't think you lost much if anything
